name: .MTC File Extension
summary: Learn about .MTC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Project created by Make the Cut!, a program that enables users to create shapes that can be cut out with a personal cutting machine; contains a page layout with any shapes, text, and lines added by the user.

content: Make the Cut! is prominently used by scrapbookers who want to create their own custom shapes. The software works with several cutting machines including Klic-N-Kut models, BossKut Gazelle, and CraftWell's eCraft.
NOTE: The MTC file can be exported to other formats, such as .SVG, .EPS, .JPG, .PNG, and .PDF using Make the Cut!

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
